laboratory_examinations.findings: Aneuploidy with a DNA index of 1.84; 32% G0/G1 and 8% S-phase.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In March 2000, DNA index was 1.86; in August 2000, DNA index was 1.89; subsequent cytogenetic tests showed no alterations in metaphase cells analyzed.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Aneuploidy with DNA index of 1.88 averaged over the course of disease.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: DNA index indicates a potential progression towards malignancy, correlating with multiple recurrences.
